localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! 🔥
blogPost.body: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! 🔥
blogPost.title: SquadPal - Build stronger connections & have fun with your remote team
blogPost.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: SquadPal是你的远程/混合团队的生活应用。通过游戏、挑战和有趣的活动，SquadPal帮助您创建一个安全的空间，与您的团队成员建立更好的联系。今天就开始吧，20人以下的团队都可以免费使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 与您的远程团队建立更紧密的联系并享受乐趣。

localize.description: SquadPal是你的遠程/混合團隊的生活應用。通過遊戲、挑戰和有趣的活動，SquadPal幫助您創建一個安全的空間，與您的團隊成員建立更好的聯繫。今天就開始吧，20人以下的團隊都可以免費使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 與您的遠程團隊建立更緊密的聯繫並享受樂趣。

previous.excerpt: This interactive guide will be the first step in helping you get started with analytics. It contains 🧠 the basic concepts and 📚 terminology you need to track your startup’s growth user engagement. 👉 Give it a try: http://guide.june.so/
previous.title: Startup Guide to Analytics - The simple guide to get started with analytics

localize.description: 本互动指南将是帮助您开始使用分析的第一步。它包含🧠基本概念和📚术语，您需要跟踪您的初创公司的增长用户参与度。👉 试试吧：http://guide.june.so/
localize.tagline: 分析学入门的简单指南

localize.description: 本互動指南將是幫助您開始使用分析的第一步。它包含🧠基本概念和📚術語，您需要跟蹤您的初創公司的增長用戶參與度。👉 試試吧：http://guide.june.so/
localize.tagline: 分析學入門的簡單指南

next.excerpt: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
next.title: Memo - Async conversations with your friends, fans, and team

localize.description: 备忘录丰富了您的对话，让您可以轻松分享链接、视频、图库等更多内容。在Memo信息中对任何单词、句子或段落进行评论。使用电子邮件地址向任何人发送内嵌丰富媒体的长篇消息。
localize.tagline: 与您的朋友、粉丝和团队进行异步对话。

localize.description: 備忘錄豐富了您的對話，讓您可以輕鬆分享鏈接、視頻、圖庫等更多內容。在Memo信息中對任何單詞、句子或段落進行評論。使用電子郵件地址向任何人發送內嵌豐富媒體的長篇消息。
localize.tagline: 與您的朋友、粉絲和團隊進行異步對話。
